Be sure to check the CD Sambas de Enredo 2010, the soundtrack of this year's Carnival in Rio de Janeiro. The big news is that the album was recorded for the first time live, with the participation of the batteries of the schools and the choir formed by the group from each community, and the handles official - an excellent sound capture ideal to feel the Marques de Sapucai .
